Unity-MARL 1.0
This project aims to develop a simulated traffic driver agent using a combination of imitation learning and reinforcement learning techniques.

Traffic Class Reference

The Traffic class manages a simulation of multiple vehicles with their positions and velocities, along with collision detection and perception. More...

Detailed Description

The Traffic class manages a simulation of multiple vehicles with their positions and velocities, along with collision detection and perception.

◆ step()

void Traffic::step ( const std::vector< int > & high_level_actions,
const std::vector< std::vector< float > > & low_level_actions )

Advances the simulation by one time step, updating agent positions and handling actions.

Performs a simulation step. Updates agent positions based on high-level and low-level actions, updates perceptions, and checks for collisions.

Parameters
high_level_actionsHigh-level actions for each agent.
low_level_actionsLow-level actions for each agent.
